subpoints.title: 10 Marla Plot

subpoints.title: 12 Marla Plot
subpoints.content: 12 Marla plots are considered premium options, offering ample space for luxury home designs, parking areas, and landscaped sections. They also carry strong resale appeal.

subpoints.title: 14 Marla Plot
subpoints.content: 14 Marla plots represent high-end residential land in Sector 13. These plots are ideal for spacious villas or custom-designed homes and are known for their long-term appreciation potential.
